name: AMUCHALIPSIS
description:
The national security minister promoves the president to the security center where all that all citys need it's controlled, because the minister think that you did a good job don't touching the red button. The problem is that you presed more than 999999 times the buton and all citys needs a lot of help. To get worse, your son and the ex president change the cables to play "fornais", and exchange the resources  for militar misiles. For this reason you musn't touch the buttons that get red. In this game you must to touch the diferent keys in keyboard to get points and reduce the defcon alert in the country. Good luck our president, you are our last chance

Link to the previous game: https://sir-cristian-docampo.itch.io/dont-touch-the-button-mrpresident
